docs.snippet: The regular season begins with the defending champion Seattle Seahawks hosting the Green Bay Packers as one of four prime-time games during the opening weekend....
docs.lead_paragraph: The regular season begins with the defending champion Seattle Seahawks hosting the Green Bay Packers as one of four prime-time games during the opening weekend.
docs.abstract: Seattle Seahawks will kick off 2014 regular season by hosting Green Bay Packers on Sept 4.

docs.snippet: The system installed by the Giants’ new offensive coordinator, Ben McAdoo, is expected to overhaul the way Eli Manning communicates with receivers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The system installed by the Giants’ new offensive coordinator, Ben McAdoo, is expected to overhaul the way Eli Manning communicates with receivers.
docs.abstract: New York Giants coordinator Ben McAdoo, who came from the Green Bay Packers, has remodeled the team's offense behind quarterback Eli Manning.

headline.main: Puzzled but Positive, Giants Learn Offense That Has Shades of Green Bay
headline.print_headline: Puzzled but Positive, Giants Learn Offense That Has Shades of Green Bay

headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute

docs.snippet: Barcelona will be allowed to sign new players this summer while it appeals an 18-month sanction handed down by soccer’s governing body....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona will be allowed to sign new players this summer while it appeals an 18-month sanction handed down by soccer’s governing body.
docs.abstract: Barcelona is allowed to sign new players while it appeals 18-month sanction handed down by soccer’s governing body, FIFA, for signing under-age players; other soccer news noted.

docs.snippet: As soon as a National Labor Relations Board official ruled that scholarship football players had the right to unionize, the university began a wide-ranging campaign to defeat a vote....
docs.lead_paragraph: As soon as a National Labor Relations Board official ruled that scholarship football players had the right to unionize, the university began a wide-ranging campaign to defeat a vote.
docs.abstract: Pressure builds at Northwestern University as football players prepare for historic vote on whether to unionize; Northwestern and many others in the college sports world see the creation of a players union as an existential threat to the foundation of the NCAA, and to their athletic programs.

headline.main: At Northwestern, a Blitz to Defeat an Effort to Unionize
headline.print_headline: At University, a Blitz to Beat a Union Effort
